# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) 
- Stone furnace (position x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5)
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of the following entity:
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when burner entities run out of fuel
- Ensure that fuel is provided to burner entities such as burner mining drills and burner inserters.

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that source items are provided to entities such as burner inserters.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that ingredients are provided to entities such as stone furnaces.

### Errors when steam engines are not connected
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the power grid.

### Errors when pipe groups are empty
- Ensure that pipe groups are filled with fluids.

### Errors when electricity groups are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network.

### Errors when belt groups are empty
- Ensure that belt groups are filled with items.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked. 
No important variables have been assigned.
